title: STOP COVID19 CAT
description: STOP COVID19 CAT is a /Salut mobile application with a double objective: 1. Respond to the information needs of citizens in relation to COVID-19, through a questionnaire that indicates whether they have the possibility of having COVID. 2. Collect population data to be able to create heat maps for the authorities.
